```

  ✖ Avoid using this.state within a this.setState call.

    2 │      function increment() {
  > 3 │       this.setState({value: this.state.value + 1});
      │       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
    4 │      }
    5 │
```

### `11: formatted`

```
function increment() {
	this.setState((prevState) => ({value: prevState.value + 1}));
}

```
